attributes.action: honour longstanding man of peace, and former MP John Hume with a peerage or knighthood.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: John Hume, who helped sign the Good Friday Agreement and who is a Nobel Peace Prize winner has not recieved the same recognition by the British Institution that his UUP counter-part David Trimble has. This petition to the Prime Minister, who has unlike any other PM, tirelessly devoted his time to Peace in Northern Ireland asks that John Hume be in some way honoured by the British Government by recieving a peerage or Knighthood for his devotion to peace in Northern Ireland.
